meanings.definition: A saying or maxim attributed to Jesus in early Christian literature.
meanings.sent1: The logions in the Bible are wise teachings from Jesus.
meanings.sent2: Scholars study the logions to understand Jesus' messages better.
meanings.sent3: The logions in the book made the readers reflect on their own beliefs.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like logions, guiding others with profound wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The logions echoed through the centuries, inspiring many to lead better lives.

meanings.definition: A collection of sayings or teachings, especially those of Jesus.
meanings.sent1: The logions gathered in the book were enlightening to read.
meanings.sent2: People cherish the logions as valuable insights into Jesus' teachings.
meanings.sent3: The logions book was so popular that it sold out within days.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a treasure trove of logions, shared with all who listened.
meanings.sent5: The logions resonated with the listeners, leaving a lasting impact on their hearts.
